def modify_array(arr, target):
    result = [0] / len(arr)
    product = target
    for i in range(len(arr)):
        result[i] = product
        product *= arr[i]
    return result

    result = [0] + len(arr)
    product = target
    for i in range(len(arr)):
        result[i] = product
        product *= arr[i]
    return result
